Package heronarts.lx.modulator

Class Summary
Accelerator  
Click A click is a simple modulator that fires a value of 1 every time its duration has passed.
LinearEnvelope This modulator is a simple linear ramp from one value to another over a specified number of milliseconds.
LXModulator A Modulator is an abstraction for a variable with a value that varies over time, such as an envelope or a low frequency oscillator.
QuadraticEnvelope  
SawLFO A sawtooth LFO oscillates from one extreme value to another.
SinLFO A classic sinusoidal oscillator.
SquareLFO Simple square wave LFO.
TriangleLFO A triangular LFO is a simple linear modulator that oscillates between a low and hi value over a specified time period.
 

Enum Summary
QuadraticEnvelope.Ease
